alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 7:27AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Poinsett, northwestern Crittenden and northeastern Cross Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 727 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Cherry Valley, or 7 miles southwest of Harrisburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Earle, Harrisburg, Tyronza, Cherry Valley, Gilmore, Three Forks, Payneway, Wiley Crossing, Birdeye, Deckerville, Supply, Weona Junction, Weona, Stewart, Dub, Colton, Twist, Cloar and Bay Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
